page.title: 16POPULATION OF CALLANDER
page.content: Between 1971 and 1981 the population of Callander and district increased by 105 persons to{4558. The15-19age group makes up the largest block with 404 persons.10%of the population is {retired.} 17% were born outwith Scotland and 3% outwith the U.K. 50%of houses are owner occupied.More than 1 in 4 households do not have a car. After High School many of the {young {people}go on to further education in the cities and very few of them ever return. {Gaelic }is spoken,read or written by 245 people.
